mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER(memberid, password, name, email, regdate) VALUES(#{memberid}, #{password}, #{name}, #{email}, sysdate)
mapper.select:
SELECT MEMBERID memberid, PASSWORD password, NAME name, EMAIL email, REGDATE regdate FROM MEMBER WHERE 1 = 1 ORDER BY memberid DESC
select s.rnum, s.MEMBERID memberid, s.PASSWORD password, s.NAME name,s.EMAIL as email, s.REGDATE regdate from ( select rownum rnum,t.* from( select MEMBERID as memberid, PASSWORD as password, NAME as name,EMAIL as email, REGDATE as regdate from member where 1=1 order by memberid desc )t )s where s.rnum between to_number(#{pageNum})*10-9 and to_number(#{pageNum})*10
